overview: Handmade and unique personal 16mm film in two parts. “Darkness, darkness, burning bright In the forests of the night Vast flowered paths, fresh branches, Groves full of perfumes, birds and whispers, Site often seen again, and always contemplated Wind that gurgles at the bottom of the chimneys that months, hours and days.…”
title: Darkness, Darkness, Burning Bright – Prelude
